import {Component} from 'react' import './index.css' export default class Login extends Component { state = { username: '', password: '', } changeInput = event => { this.setState({username: event.target.value}) } changePassword = event => { this.setState({password: event.target.value}) } render() { const {username} = this.state console.log(username) return (

Sign In

) } }
